tim . whilemartian memorandum ( 1991 ) continued this tradition of excellent , engaging , and visually stunning gameplay , it was n't untilunder killing moon ( 1994 ) that the series really took leap into the forefront of pc gaming.under killing moonnot only provided players with rich full-motion vide but was also one of the first games to featur tru hollywood cast . as for the gameplay experienc `` best fantasy role-playing/adventur program '' at the cod awards.th pandor direct ( 1996 ) continued this tradition of groundbreaking technology by being one of the first fmv adventur titles to featur multipl endings , multipl gameplay paths , and shipped on 6 compact discs . it also featured hollywood acting talent and won `` best adventur gam of 1996 '' by both computer gaming world , and computer gam entertainment.tex murphy : overseer ( 1998 ) would next , and would be the first pc gam titl to be released on the very new ( at the tim ) dvd format . this enabled the gam 's full-motion vide to be presented at levels of quality never befor seen vide gam . whil the gam was re-telling of the originalmean streetsstory , it also featured hollywood acting talent , and completely redesigned 3d virtual world engine.16 years would pass between overseer 's releas and tesl effect 's continuation of the series ( thanks to successfully funded kickstarter campaign ) . it would once contenutoeternal lords is the major , second expansion for the acclaimed strategy gam age of wonders iii , marking one year of continuous development sinc its releas . with the introduction of the tigran and frostling races and the new necromancer class , players must adapt to world on the brink of cataclysmic chang . new features such as the rac governanc system , whic allows players to tailor features of each rac the empir to meet the strategic needs , add new layers of depth to empir development and diplomacy . embrac the forbidden powers and reign for eternity ! eternal lords content includes : the necromancer player class : the necromancer ’ s legions marc to establish an eternal kingdom , unifying the world ’ s races death . the necromancer creates spectacul undead units , such as the bon collector , crablik monstrosity whic eats corpses to strengthen itself . other units are summoned , such as the banshe , whic invokes desp the hearts of the living . the necromancer ’ s dark magic allows players to convert towns to cities of the dead , filled obedient ghoul minions.torc bearers , grey guard and shadow born leader specializations : thes champions of good , neutrality and evil respectively deepen the alignment mechanics and provid players of classes powers to withstand the challenges of the new age . learn spells to summon mighty angels , end gam units who embody the essenc of each alignment.frostling player rac : frostlings are rac of humanoids that emerged from the frozen north . lead by the ice queens , they embark on frequent raids warmer lands . the seafaring skills , offens fighting style and frost magic spread fear among the coastlin villages they pillag . frostings are even mor deadly the hom arctic clim , wher they build cities carved into the very glaciers they hop will someday grow to cover the earth.tigran player rac : thes felin humanoids hail from remot desert lands . they worship the sun and track the cycle of day and night ; lif and death . the natural curiosity about necromancy and the passing of regal souls into kingdoms of glory the afterlif inspires them to construct massiv tombs . tigrans are natural sprinters , capabl of moving far faster combat than members of the other races , and are famil with shap changing magic , allowing the mystics to transform into dir panthers.eternal lords story campaign . an epic battl of the forces of creation : fir versus ice , lif versus death . as arvik , heir to broken frostling kingdom , you awaken forbidden necromantic powers to reclaim your realm . you will find unlikely allies , and must choos between your frostling roots or the full potential of your new found powers.cosmic happenings : the dawn of the eternal lords has triggered cataclysmic events that can radically shift fortunes . thes events occur as the gam progresses , disrupting the best laid plans and providing opportunities for cunning players to gain an advantag . falling clouds can fill the world with mist , giving shock weakness to machin and armored units and reducing sight rang , whil the marc of the troll king can caus armies of trolls to rampag across the map.rac governanc : relations are now tracked rac , allowing you to mak careful decisions who to mak war with . declaring war on an elven city might giv you quick conquest , but don ’ t expect your elven citizens to be happy about it afterwards ! as your relations with each rac improv , you will be able to earn uniqu racial perks that boost your armies and economy.unifier victory condition.when reaching maximum governanc for rac , the production of unity beacon is unlocked cities of that rac . building unity beacons for the number of races set the victory condition , makes you the great unifier and wins the game dozen mysterious map locations : captur the reef colony dwelling , hom to horrors of the deep , and discover new treasur sites such as the lich ’ s castl , templ of the sands and the hall of the forefathers to benefit your empire.plus new her items , standalon scenarios and mor ! eternal lords incorporates feedback from the community and coincides with fre updat adding : play by email `` a-synch '' multiplayer mod : whic lets you play age of wonders iii when you want . you get an email notification when it ’ s your turn , boot the gam and triumph ’ s server automatically sends and receives your gam dat for you.new content and features are integrated into the updated random map generator.+ grand theft aut v svilupp : rockst north pubblic : rockst games grand theft aut v pc gioc without drawing paycheck from team . overse team finances , keep an eye on the salary cap , hir your staff , put together trad packages , mak contract offers to fre agents , and draft the newest generation of stars.new for 2015new gam engin : the heart and soul of fhm 2 - the gam engin - has been completed redesigned from the ground up . this creates the most realistic results ever seen hockey simulation . with the new engin , every second of gam is simulated and the engin keeps track of exactly whic zones the puck and players are , at times . this allows us to simul the flow of hockey gam much better than befor , with each event playing out throug the engine.revamped tactics system : you can trad for , sign , draft and develop the best and most talented players , but that ’ s only part of the challeng franchis hockey manager 2 . in order to truly reac full potential , you will need to put plac the optimal strategies to get the most out of your players . the tactics system and the entir gam engin franchis hockey manager 2 has been rewritten . it is now far mor robust , detailed and it provides far mor depth , better immersion and bigger tactical challeng . or , if you 'd prefer , you can hav the computer tak tactical control , or borrow successful tactic created by another user.expansion : want to bring pro hockey to your hometown or favor city ? franchis hockey manager 2 now supports expansion for the nhl and fictional leagues.if you ’ re the general manager of an existing team , you ’ ll hav to mak toug choices about whic players to protect from the expansion draft - should you stick with your veteran goaltender or turn the reins over to your young unproven talent ? as an expansion franchis you will hav the uniqu challeng of trying to build contender from the spar parts of other teams . but with shrewd moves and som patienc , your new expansion franchis could quickly becom contender ! facegen : franchis hockey manager 2 will bring facegen technology to the series , to greatly enhanc immersion . players and coaches will receiv individual portraits , wearing the team uniform or colours , and the pictures will age , gain or los weight throughout career . facegen also allows for custom user-created jerseys to be used for each team , as well as individual user-created portraits.and that 's only sampling of som of the new additions to fhm 2 . ther ’ s also host of smaller changes that will hav big impact on the gam : a completely overhauled graphic user interfac makes franchis hockey manager much mor visually appealing and easier to navigategam rating : fhm 2 features new way for you to evalu the performanc of your players - the gam rating ( gr ) . during gam , each event ( good or bad ) will chang the gr , so you always know how well player performs on the ice . sinc the calculation includes the rol of the player and the situation on the ice , you can get pretty good pictur of the performanc . not players are goal scorers and will hav the names show the scor sheet - now you can accurately track how everyon is contributing to your team 's success or failur , from your stay-at-hom defensemen to your grinding 4th lin forwards.redesigned fictional mod : we hav removed the fictional mod from fhm 2014 and replaced it with new version that is much mor streamlined and stabl . now you can play with just one find yourself on trial , accused of brutal murder . how far will you go to exoner yourself ? will you lie , seek evidenc to prop your testimony or , perhaps , pretend to be insan ? your imagination is the limit.overviewbohemian killingis narrative-driven courtroom dram , offering players almost unlimited possibilities of solving the lawsuit , thanks to the compl integration of gameplay and narrated story . it is also the first law-themed gam mad bya real-lif lawyer ! storylinewelcom to paris of the lat 19th century . the aftermath of the great revolution offered new start for each and every citizen , regardless of social class . alfred ethon , young inventor of gypsy origin , benefits from the chang , becoming symbol of success thanks to his hard work and innov projects , well ahead of the time.soon , young woman is brutally murdered - maid working for an impoverished lord , relic of the old frenc regim . is alfred ethon to be blamed for the murder ? the evidenc points towards him ... but you can chang that.as you stand befor the court , you can count on is your own intellect and creativity . but how does that look practic ? gameplaygameplay bohemian killing is combination of courtroom dram , and walking simulator . it can be classified as first person experienc , or first person interact story adventur game.th story is set within two tim frames . in the present , you find yourself locked up the courtroom . you 're getting acquainted with the evidenc , witness testimony and questions posed by the judg . each question triggers flashback - and begins your testimony . during the flashback you find yourself parisian district , with each of your decisions , interactions and action affecting alfred ethons ' testimony and the final verdict.t help you your testimony , you 'll hav access to the evidenc gathered on the cas - expert opinions , reports and witness testimonies . each of them can be ( but does n't hav to be ! ) refuted number of different ways.in theevidencemenu you can familiariz yourself with testimonies of witnesses , forensic expertises , physical evidences , etc . they are grouped into appropr categories , making them easy to find.sampl : a neighbor testified that at approximately 10 p.m. he passed you the entranc of the tenement hous , noticing that your clothes wer covered blood ? try testifying that your neighbor lies and prov that he has reason to do so . or mayb you 'll get into bar fight just few minutes befor , so that you can testify that the blood the neighbor saw was yours , and not the victim 's ? or mayb you will cut yourself whil shaving , covering your clothes with blood that the neighbor sees later ? but what if the court finds your tim of shaving conspicuous and torments you with even mor questions ? how will you get out of this ? with wid rang of possibilities that can lead to several standard endings and one additional hidden one , the gam does n't consider any path `` bad one '' , ensuring that each playthroug will be different.t adjust the gam to the preferences of each player , two modes are availabl : in thestandardmod , the outcom depends entirely on your creativity and ability to solv logical problems . you will suffer the consequences of your own actions.in thestorymod , your attorney will advis you as you progress along , commenting on your decisions and choices , preventing you from acting way that might prov to be harmful the eyes of the court.voic actingth main character of the gam is played and dubbed by world-class film and voic actor , stephan cornicard ! stephan cornicard studied franc , at the prestigious colby colleg the us , and at goldsmith colleg the uk . he played numerous blockbusters such as “ spectr , ” the most recent bond film , or steven spielberg ’ s “ saving priv ryan ” .his career as voic actor is no less impress and includes syphon filter , primal , metal gear solid , and the dragon age and total war series . he currently teaches dram at the actor ’ s centr london.+ death road to canad svilupp : rocketcat games madgarden pubblic : rocketcat games inform giocodeath road to canad is randomly generated road trip simulator . you control gt3 rsporsc 718 spyder rsporsc cayman gt4porsc 718 boxster s manual transmissionporsc 718 boxster s pdkporsc 919 hybrid 2015porsc 911 gt1porsc 962c long tailporsc 962c short tailporsc 911 gt3 rswith the 911 gt3 rs , porsc is once again breaking down the barrier between sports cars and rac cars . it is equipped with the maximum degre of motorsport technology that is currently possibl street-legal 911 . with lap tim of seven minutes and 20 seconds , the 911 gt3 rs even beats the historic record valu of the carrer gt super sports car of just under seven minutes and 29 seconds on the north loop of the nürburgring.motorsport expertis is the reason for this superior performanc . the 911 gt3 rs is powered by four-litr six-cylinder engin with 500 hp ( 368 kw ) of power and 460 newton metres of torqu , combined with specially developed pdk transmission . the engin , whic has the largest displacement and most power of any naturally aspirated engin with direct fuel injection the 911 family , accelerates the high-performanc sports car from zer to 100 km/h 3.3 seconds and to 200 km/h 10.9 seconds.th 911 gt3 rs is masterpiec of intelligent lightweight design . for the first tim , the roof is mad of magnesium ; carbon fibr is used for the engin and luggag compartment lids , and other lightweight components are mad of altern materials . in addition , the lightweight roof lowers the sports car 's centr of gravity whic improves its excellent lateral dynamics . the body comes from the 911 turb , and it signifies its status as nearly rac car driving machin with its rs-specific aerodynamic add-on parts . the front spoiler lip , whic extends nearly to the road , and the larg rear wing reinforc its dominant look.another characteristic is the uniqu front wheel arch air vents that extend into the upper section of the wings – just as purebred motorsport cars . they increas downforc at the front axle.th chassis of the 911 gt3 rs has been tuned for maximum driving dynamics and precision . rear-axl steering and porsc torqu vectoring plus with fully variabl rear axle differential lock increas agility and dynamics , and the wider front and rear track widths enabl superior roll stability . in addition , the 911 gt3 rs comes with the widest tyres of any 911 model as standard . the results : even mor agil turn-in characteristics and even higher cornering speeds.porsc 718 spyder rsin 1960 , porsc continued its long list of victories , whic began with the legendary porsc 550 spyder rac car 1953 , with an exceptional vehicl : the type 718 rs 60 . in respons to new fia rac car rul , whic demanded they mor closely resembl standard production vehicles , the displacement of the rs 60 developed on the basis of the 718 rsk was not only increased to 1,600 cc , it also gained som rather unusual features for rac car , namely larger windshield , functional hood and luggag compartment located at the rear , behind the four-cam four-cylinder engin whic now produced 160 hp . externally , the new spyder was recognisabl by its deep , rounded front and backward tapering bulg at the rear.from the outset , the 718 rs 60 becam racing big shot , recording the sports car manufacturer 's greatest successes to dat , particularly long-distanc events : at its very first outing , the 12h of sebring , the gendebien/herrmann and holbert/sheckter driver teams achieved the top two spots . overall victory at the 44th targ flor 1960 also went to porsc , when joakim bonnier and hans hermann crossed the finish lin with lead of mor than six minutes over the three-litr ferrar . second plac the 1000 kilometres of nürburgring completed its triumphant run . with the swiss racing driver , hein walter , at the wheel , the 718 rs proved its climbing qualities by consecutively winning the third and fourth european hill climb championships 1960 and 1961.porsc cayman gt4the cayman gt4 marks the first tim porsc has introduced gt sports car based on the cayman model rang whic has components of the 911 gt3 . a lap tim of 7 minutes and 40 seconds on the north loop of the nürburgring positions the cayman gt4 as the new benchmark at the top of its market segment.th engin , chassis , brakes and aerodynamic design of the cayman gt4 are configured for maximum driving dynamics . it is powered by 3.8-litr flat-six engin with 385 hp ( 283 kw ) , whic is derived from the 911 carrer s engin . its power is always transmitted by six-speed manual gearbox with dynamic gearbox mounts . the cayman gt4 accelerates from zer to 100 km/h 4.4 seconds ; its top speed is 295 km/h . the chassis – whic features 30 mm lower body position and generously sized brak system – consists nearly entirely of components from the 911 gt3.as mid-engin sports car and prim exampl of driving dynamics its class , it follows the conceptual tradition of such cars as the 904 carrer gts , 911 gt1 , carrer gt and 918 spyder . henc , the cayman gt4 makes cle statement that porsc continues to promot radical two-door sports cars the futur – sports cars that are developed at the motorsport department weissach.porsc 718 boxster s manual transmission / pdk20 years after the first boxster mad its debut , porsc has restructured its mid-engin roadsters 2016 . the designation for the new generation of models is 718 boxster and 718 boxster s. this way , porsc continues the tradition of the four-cylinder flat engines that wer used the porsc 718 mid-engin sports cars that won numerous races back the 1950s and 1960s , among them being the legendary targ flor and le mans.th centrepiec of the new model series is the newly developed four-cylinder flat engin with turbocharging - the first tim sinc the lat 1960s that porsc is again implementing sports cars with this type of engin . the 718 boxster s develops 257 kw ( 350 hp ) from 2.5 litres of displacement . in the s-model , porsc also uses turbocharger with variabl turbin geometry . in fact porsc is now the only manufacturer to offer vtg technology production cars with petrol-driven engines , both the 911 turb and the 718 boxster s.turbocharging significantly boosts torqu . the 2.5-litr engin of the 718 boxster s attains 420 newton metres over speed rang from 1,900 rpm to 4,500 rpm , whic also leads to faster sprint performanc . the 718 boxster s – with porsc doppelkupplungsgetrieb ( pdk ) and sport chron packag – sprints from zer to 100 km/h 4.2 seconds . the top speed is 285 km/h.in its driving dynamics , the new roadster also follows the tracks of the original 718 . the car 's completely retuned chassis enhances cornering performanc . the electromechanical steering system is configured to be ten cent mor direct . this makes the 718 boxster even mor agil and easier to steer , both on circuit tracks and everyday traffic , and provides passion and sporty driving pleasure.porsc 919 hybrid 2015the wec regulations lay down strict requirements relating to efficiency , safety and sustainability motorsports . in short : vehicles that are designed for the futur . thes requirements hav inspired porsc 's engineers to carry on what porsc has been doing for over 60 years . avoiding an either/or approac to isolated technologies , and instead examining every possibl detail without losing sight of the overall picture.in the lmp1 class , the principl of dominanc throug maximum performanc will giv way to the demand for efficiency . for the first tim the rac ’ s history , of the works teams the top classification must comp with hybrid racing vehicles.porsc 's choic of combustion engin was born out of an efficiency-optimized approac : highly compact , turbocharged four-cylinder 2-liter engin with direct fuel injection . the combustion engin is supported by two energy recuperation systems . years of experienc designing sports cars helped us to reduc the weight of individual components even further . the sports prototyp is mad mainly of carbon . in addition , the engin mad of high-strength aluminum and the use of magnesium and various titanium alloys also helped to achiev the ideal system weight.porsc 911 gt1the 911 gt1 was developed for works and customer appearances gt races during the mid-1990s , making its racing debut 1996 . the gt1 was the first ever 911 to hav water-cooled mid-mounted engin , whic as well as balanced axle load distribution also offered aerodynamic benefits . behind joest team twr porsc wsc 95 , the new gt rac car immediately achieved doubl victory the gt1 category at le mans 1996 , along with second and third plac the overall ranking.in 1997 , both 911 gt1s dropped out of le mans due to technical problems encountered just befor the end of the rac . a year later , revised version of the 911 gt1 competed at le mans , whic was the first tim porsc entered sports car with carbon fibr chassis . thanks to its cfk monocoqu , reworked front axle suspension and battery and generator weight savings , the 911 gt1 98 weighed around 50 kilograms less than its predecessor . the engin output was increased by further 50 hp , thanks to its modified engin management system . another new featur was the three-disc racing clutc mad of carbon fibre.as fitting trib to the 50th anniversary of the porsc sports car brand , the 911 gt1 recorded doubl victory for the zuffenhausen-based manufacturer at the 24h of le mans 1998.porsc 962c long tail / short tailfirst developed 1984 for use the usa , from 1985 the porsc 962 c continued the successful global motorsport story begun by its predecessor model , the 956 , 1982 . porsc undertook pioneering work developing thes rac cars , adapting the aerodynamic ground-effect used formul 1 to the new rac cars . wing profiles the sidepods and diffusers the underbody produced vacuum that 'sucked ' the car to the track surfac during driving , resulting extrem cornering speeds . the 956 and 962 c had aluminium monocoques that wer around 80 % stiffer than the tubul spac fram of the predecessors . as the rules limited fuel consumption , porsc used ground-breaking injection and ignition systems . som of the differences between the 962 c and the 956 wer longer wheelbas , narrower tyres and increased weight ( minimum weight of 850 instead of 800 kilograms ) , along with further improved aerodynamics . initially fitted with 2.65-litr twin-turb engin , the 962 c was first powered by fully water-cooled three-litr twin-turb engin producing up to 700 hp during practic at le mans 1985 . the 962 c won le mans 1986 , 1987 , 1989 and 1994 , following the 956 's unbeaten run the 24h rac from 1982 to 1985 . porsc won fiv driver and thre manufacturer 's world championship titles with thes \ '' wing cars\ '' between 1982 and 1986.hans-joachim stuck , derek bell and al holbert won the 24h of le mans on 13 and 14 jun 1987 the 962 006 . the following year , mar , michael and john andrett used \ '' 006\ '' as practic car ( t-car ) at le mans , after whic it was acquired by the porsc museum.+ amer , inc. inform giocoin the new futur , everyon 's mental stat and disposition can now be quantified.everything from emotional tendencies to criminal behavior are recorded and utilized as guidelin to lead everyon to the good lif : not only pursuing happiness , but attaining it . needless to say , the public was excited to begin quantifying the everyday lives . the general term for this valu , whic determines the morality of an individual 's heart and soul , is commonly known as the psycho-pass.on component of this valu is the crim coefficient , whic is ultimately number that represents an individual 's potential to commit crim . in order to combat thos who attempt to disrupt the status quo , detectives work tandem to maintain peac and order , composed of enforcers and inspectors . the former is tasked with apprehending suspects , whil the latter oversees and commands the subordin colleagues . after , enforcers possess high crim coefficients . however , becaus of the criminal natur , they can better understand what makes other criminals tick , allowing them to sniff out suspects and arrest the tru perpetrators . but becaus of the criminal background , inspectors are needed to provid calm and sound judgement to each cas . ultimately , members of the mwpsb hav to walk fin lin , maintaining the own mental health whil facing the worst that society has to offer.with justic the hearts , the detectives of division 1 tackl each cas , confronting humanity 's ugly truths.but , what lies ahead ? + outlast 2 xbox one ( europ ) svilupp : red barrels pubblic : red barrels inform giocoth waw bas pack , contains thegam engin , the tutorial and10 different scenarios ( and can mak use of futur dlcs and packs ) : hamilk 264 , the long first punic war , the first rom vs. carthag war.hastings 1066 , opposing normans , vikings ands saxons to claim the crown of england.saratog 1777 , the battl that changed the cours of the war of independence.waterlo 1815 , the last epic nazis against the soviets.not that if you already own on steam som of the scenarios the bas pack , they will not be charged again.waw is uniqu strategy turn-based gam concept , on boardgam spirit , whic aims at simulating one singl system all conflicts throughout the world ( and beyond ) from prehistoric times to nowadays , from grand massiv wars to asymmetrical conflicts . and it will work also on non-historical , altern history , fantastic or sf titles . the key is the use of singl system of rules and situations whic works cases.why ? becaus we want players to learn rules only once , get confident and at eas with them , and then spend the tim with the titles the collection speedy and effortless manner ... for exampl , the battl screen will be simil throughout the games , and thus will requ almost no adaptation for enjoying it new gam ! practically , few minutes are required to read about the specific properties and content of new scenar and you can jump right ! the main gam features includes : gam is turn-based , using the i go u go system , each player taking one sid ( sides involv sometimes mor than one nation ) .the map is divided into numerous regions , with various terrains and sometimes structures ( ports , fortresses , airports ... ) , and potentially sources of incom when necessary.when maintenanc and purchas of forces is needed , or to acquir new event cards , simpl incom system is activated.combat units may be from the land , naval or air domains . you will find different types , such as infantry , cavalry , artillery , guerrillas , submarines , flat tops , fighters , elephants , anti-aircraft batteries , etc ... all of whic can be combined into different stacks for easy handling.leaders are crucial the gam , as they hav thre main usages : first they giv bonus to the bas combat values of the stacks , second the moral values are use to check victory or defeat levels , and lastly they are necessary to launc attacks on the enemy.tw opposing stacks the sam region gener battl , whic is resolved semi-tactical way two success rounds . the gam automatically calculates the various bonus and penalties of sides , the respect moral levels , allows for event cards play , and they each combat unit of each sid shoots simultaneously ( most cases ) at the enemy . losses are taken terms of hits and panics . the moral level of the initial army affected by the losses and panics suffered , whic turn may lead to rout , pursuit and breakthroughs.multipl events cards packs are granted to each sid , that they will use to influenc aspects of the gam , such as alliances , incom , movement , weather , leadership , number and quality of troops and finally many tactical aspects for the battles . this ensures both real uncertainty the gam and great replayability potential.th scal changes according to scenarios . a ground combat unit could be only simpl battalion or whol army . a region may represent few squar miles or whol country . and similarly , gam turn could be just few hours or up to many years ! gam allows for coverag of different ‘ spaces ’ of play , such as land , sea , air or outer space… ! planningeac month , new scenar perform several chain movements . you will feel the power of controlling character that perfectly responds to your actions ! storyin far futur , earth was devastated by mutants who took control after f2004my 2017 812 superfastmy 2017 sf70hthe carsferrar 250 gtoth 250 gto model was the pinnacl of the development of the 250 gt series competition form , whilst still remaining road car . it mad its public debut at the annual pre-season ferrar press conferenc january 1962 , and was the only front-engined model on display , with its monopost and sports racing counterparts having mid-engin configuration.th 250 gto was the ultim expression of the ferrar 250 gt car . it was equally at hom on the road or track – perhaps the last dual-purp road/rac car produced – and has achieved legendary status amongst aficionados of the marqu . with only relatively small production run of thirty-six cars , and with many of the examples produced having great racing pedigre , it has becom one of the icons of ferrar 's production history , with revered position collectors ' circles.ferrar 312/67scuder ferrar started the 1967 championship with the 312/67 . the car 's official debut was at the champions ' rac brands-hatc with bandin and scarfiott behind the wheel.th scuder 's best results cam courtesy of new zealander chris amon , who managed third position on the podium on thre occasions.ferrar 330 p4with styling very simil to that of the 330 p3 , this model was powered by v12 engin that had been radically redesigned by franc rocc . the most obvious modification was the introduction of three-valv cylinder head – two inlet and one exhaust.fuel feed was provided by lucas injection system . the chassis was slightly shorter than the 330 p3 's , and the new suspension system improved roadholding . the car won numerous races and earned its plac the history books after memorabl 1-2-3 at daytona.ferrar gtoannounced by enzo ferrar september 1983 , and unveiled at the gen motor show marc 1984 , the gto ( also unofficially known with the 288 prefix ) sparked off wav of enthusiasm . the legendary nam , the stunning styling by pininfarin , the engin with its seemingly inexhaustibl power ( 2.8 litres and 8 cylinders ) and the widespread use of compos materials mad the gto the closest thing to racing car.t meet customer demand , 272 wer built instead of the planned 200 : wer sold befor production began.th 288 appellation refers to the total cubic capacity of the engin and number of cylinders , 2.8 litres with 8 cylinders . obviously , the \ '' gto\ '' model nam was retr touc referring to the legendary 250 gto of the early sixties , to whic it was intended to be the spiritual successor gt racing.ferrar f2004the year 2004 , the record season for ferrar , went into second act with the 2004 championship : out of the 18 gps , the scuder won 15 races ( 13 by schumacher , 2 by barrichell ) , 8 one-tw wins , 12 pol positions for total of 262 points the constructors ' championship . already august , ferrar archived the championship files : at the hungarian gp the scuder won the constructors ' titl – the 14th its history – with one-tw win , whil schumacher gained his fifth titl row , the seventh of his career , belgium , on the sam track wher he debuted the year 1991.the season mad history also thanks to one of the most competit single-seaters ever built : the f2004 , fitted with the new engin dubbed 053 , 10-cylinder unit with 865 bhp at 18,300 rpm , whic exceeded expectations terms of performanc and reliability , also regarding the new challeng set by the regulations , whic aimed at reducing costs : one engin rac weekend , with an averag lifespan of 800 instead of 350 kilometres.ferrar 812 superfastferrar chos the ushers new ferrar 12-cylinder history , doing so building on the invaluabl legacies of the f12berlinett and f12tdf . it is aimed at clients demanding the most powerful and exclus ferrar the rang : an uncompromising sports car that will deliver exhilarating driving both on road and track yet also be comfortabl enoug to allow its owners to enjoy it as an all-round experience.ferrar sf70hthe 63rd single-seater designed and built by scuder ferrar to tak part the 2017 championship is born out of regulation chang that is without precedent this category of motor sport . in the past , regulations generally went the direction of slowing the cars down . however , the year 2017 the rul changes went the oppos direction , meaning the cars can hav mor aerodynamic downforc and mor mechanical grip.th giocojonathan hunt is journalist from new york . solving the cas of yoomurjak ’ s ring earned him the reputation of an expert of mysteries the past . this tim he is asked by nucl physics instit to throw light upon disappearanc , but the mission turns into hunt for pecul meteor that fell on earth centuries ago . what is insid the devilish ston ? ther must be good reason why certain persons hav been trying to get hold of it at costs.playing as the main character third-person perspect , you will- investig curious disappearanc and searc for clues- decipher secret documents- solv puzzles left behind from the past- explor the enigmas of obscur laboratories top-level scientific institute- interview characters about what they know and what they do- when troubl , use the laws of natur and common sens to escape- unravel the legend of mysterious cosmic treasures and prevent disaster ! key features : • immers storyline• third-person perspective• live-action cinematic scenes• over 20 real locations to explore• over 20 characters by excellent actors and voic artists• a series of puzzles and challenging tasks perfectly integrated the plot• smart apps for various tasks• easy mod : optional tutorial , in-gam hints and skip-puzzl functions• logged dialoguesabout the previous episod : yoomurjak ’ s ringth story begins when jonathan hunt , journalist from new york , arrives the city of eger hungary for break . he has local ancestry and speaks the languag , but this is not the only motiv for his visit . in the heritag of his great-grandfather , the globetrotter professor samuel hunt ( known from the agon series ) , he found two letters dated back 1898 . the letters wer from somewhat lunatic hungarian scientist about tim machin he claimed to be working on . the references point to eger , and jonathan wants to find out what happened to the man and his preposterous invention . but soon he realizes that someon is desperately trying to stop him…about the development of miazmalik yoomurjak ’ s ring , this titl is also an fmv adventur gam , developed by the sam crew . it takes you to real locations with live-action cinematic approac . the gam designer is pierrot , also known for his adventur gam series agon.miazm was developed with the support of the instit for nucl researc of the hungarian academy of sciences ( atomk ) the framework of scientific project understandable-availabl physics . english localization was supported by eps , nupecc and ensar2 . additional supporters : kia motors hungary.+ total war sag : thrones of britann ( europ )
